about.title: CryptoGuardian
about.subtitle: Real-time Security Verification Platform for Cryptocurrency Investors

problem.title: Billions Lost to Crypto Scams Every Year
problem.description1: In 2023 alone, South Korea saw over $75 million in losses from cryptocurrency scams. Fake exchanges, phishing sites, and scam tokens are becoming increasingly sophisticated.
problem.description2: New investors struggle to distinguish official sites from imposters. Searching for "Binance" might lead you to "binance-kr.com" or similar fake domains, resulting in devastating losses.

realtime.title: Real-time Multi-source Verification
realtime.description: We query major security databases including KISA, VirusTotal, and URLhaus in real-time to assess risk levels instantly.

exchange.title: Verified Exchange Information
exchange.description: Only verified exchange data from CoinGecko and CryptoCompare. Trust scores and trading volumes help you choose safe platforms.

community.title: Community Reporting System
community.description: Users can report and share suspicious sites directly. New scam tactics are quickly identified and blocked.

weekly.title: Weekly Updates
weekly.description: Automatic weekly updates of blacklists and exchange information. Always protecting you with the latest data.

step1.title: Enter Suspicious URL
step1.description: Input any crypto-related site: exchanges, wallets, DeFi platforms.

step2.title: Instant Verification Results
step2.description: Clear indicators: Safe, Caution, or Danger status.

step3.title: Review Detailed Information
step3.description: Risk factors, alternative exchanges, evidence links, and more.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: CryptoGuardian was built to protect cryptocurrency investors across Asia. Our goal is simple: make crypto trading safer for everyone, regardless of technical expertise.
mission.description2: No security system is perfect. But we work tirelessly to gather the latest threat intelligence and provide the fastest, most accurate verification service possible.
mission.disclaimer: Disclaimer: This service is for reference only. Users bear full responsibility for their investment decisions. Always verify from multiple sources and invest carefully.
